Title: Warmth of Life
Description:
The Druids of the Flame practice virulent magics that warp and burn all they touch. They do, however, have excellent taste in alchemical reagents.

If you should happen across any of their metamorphic ash, could you gather it up for me? One of my contacts within the Dream has been asking after the stuff.
ObjectivesText: Collect eight samples of Metamorphic Ash from Druids of the Flame in the Smoldering Copse.

Objectives.Text: Complete the events of "Enter the Dream"
